description.what: I started working as a QA Engineer at
description.info: Through a user-friendly app and a local network of reliable shoppers, Shipt connects members to fresh groceries and everyday essentials.
All Tests Passed is a blog where I post solutions to programming problems. Check it out here!
I graduated with a B.S. in Mathematics-Computer Science!
This 12 week bootcamp offered by Codepath University and sponsored by Facebook covered web security principles, common exploits, and how to prevent them.

description.what: Started working as a Help Desk Technician for
description.emphasis: Information Technology Services at UC San Diego
description.info: From phone calls about software, to dorm room cable issues, to A/V problems in classrooms, we provided technical support to the students and faculty of UCSD.

description.what: Became part of the QA team at
description.info: Stitch Music was an iOS application that provided a way for users to share experiences from their favorite performers live events. As part of the QA team I helped create and moderate user content as well as extensively tested new builds of the app.
I loved San Diego! If you find yourself here go hike Iron Mountain and get tacos at Puestos.
With an A.S. in Computer Science I was ready to transfer to UC San Diego!

description.what: Became a volunteer Computer Docent for
description.info: As a Computer Docent I taught patrons basic computer skills like creating email accounts, using office programs, and filling out online applications. In addition, I taught kids how to use the programming language Scratch to make animations and games.

description.what: Interned as a System Administrator for
description.info: Received training and assisted the clients of Cogent Solutions with various system adminstration tasks.

description.what: Became a Technical Support Specialist at
description.info: I provided IT support for two offices of over twenty users. During my three years here I was the first contact for all tech support and developed custom templates and databases that integrated with our patient records.
